mapper.select: SELECT d.drug_code AS drugCode, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.unit_price As unitPrice, COALESCE(d.quantity, 0) AS totalQuantity, COALESCE(d.location, '-') AS location, d.expiration_date AS expirationDate, d.supplier AS supplier, d.min_stock AS minStock, dc.is_checked AS isChecked FROM drug d LEFT join drug_check dc on d.drug_code = dc.drug_code

SELECT d.drug_code AS drugCode, d.drug_name AS drugName, d.unit_price As unitPrice, COALESCE(d.quantity, 0) AS totalQuantity, COALESCE(d.location, '-') AS location, d.expiration_date AS expirationDate, d.supplier AS supplier, d.min_stock AS minStock, dc.is_checked AS isChecked FROM drug d LEFT JOIN drug_check dc ON d.drug_code = dc.drug_code AND dc.check_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND dc.check_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE()) WHERE dc.check_date IS NULL;
SELECT quantity FROM drug WHERE drug_code = #{drugCode}
select drug_code from drug_check where check_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND check_date <= LAST_DAY(CURDATE())

SELECT dcd.detail_id, dcd.check_id, dcd.status, dcd.quantity as quantity, dcd.note, dcd.is_checked, d.drug_name, d.expiration_date, dp.location, dp.purchase_id, d.unit, d.supplier, d.insurance_code, d.min_stock, dp.quantity as totalQuantity FROM drug_check_detail dcd join drug_check dc on dcd.check_id = dc.check_id join drug d on d.drug_code = dc.drug_code join drug_purchase dp on dp.drug_code = dc.drug_code WHERE dcd.purchase_id = #{purchaseId} ORDER BY FIELD(dcd.status, 'PASS', 'WARNING', 'DISPOSE')

select d.drug_name, d.unit, d.unit_price, dc.check_id, d.supplier, dp.purchase_id, dp.location, dp.quantity AS totalQuantity from drug_check dc JOIN drug d ON dc.drug_code = d.drug_code JOIN drug_purchase dp ON dc.drug_code = dp.drug_code AND dc.purchase_id = dp.purchase_id
mapper.update: update drug d left join( select drug_code, sum(quantity) as total_qty from drug_purchase group by drug_code ) p on d.drug_code = p.drug_code set d.quantity = coalesce(p.total_qty,0) where d.drug_code = #{drugCode}
mapper.insert: insert into drug_log(drug_code, type, quantity, before_stock,after_stock, memo) values(#{drugCode},#{type},#{quantity},#{beforeStock},#{afterStock},#{memo})
